data.text:
Speaking soon at #UNGA: 
Russian Federation; Jordan: @KingAbdullahII; Republic of Korea: @moonriver365; Qatar: @TamimBinHamad; Philippines; Iran: @HassanRouhani; and France: @EmmanuelMacron. 

See: https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek

The #COVID19 pandemic has taught us our choices matter.

As we look to the future, let us make sure we choose wisely.  

-- @antonioguterres tells #UNGA. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek https://t.co/sE7oCWA0B7

#UNGA speakers this morning: 
Brazil: @jairbolsonaro; USA: @POTUS; Turkey: @RTErdogan; China; Chile: @sebastianpinera; South Africa: @CyrilRamaphosa; and Cuba: @DiazCanelB. 

See: https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek

The #UNGA General Debate is underway - watch it live. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek.

https://t.co/FeALnb5ws3

😷 wear a face mask at all times
🙂↔️🙂 maintain physical distance
🧴 wash hands frequently

For those attending #UNGA in person this year, these steps can help keep you and others safe amid the #COVID19 pandemic.

More details: https://t.co/8c6gdOMGJm https://t.co/hnrczZOCVt

From wherever you are in the 🌍🌏🌎, here's your chance to join the historic 75th #UNGA.

Tap below to see the latest updates, as leaders seek solutions for some of the biggest challenges the world is facing, including #COVID19 & the climate crisis. https://t.co/bk7CV9aMob
Leaders from around the world joined in a common pledge to promote peace as #UNGA marks the 75th anniversary of the UN. https://t.co/TpNu6k1SGg #UN75 https://t.co/eYzdB7Ci51

Each and every one of us can contribute to a more peaceful world. 

On Monday's #PeaceDay & every day, join us in spreading compassion, kindness & hope in the face of the #COVID19 pandemic.
https://t.co/LaDpKojrJc

The climate crisis has not stopped amid #COVID19. 

People around the world are demanding that urgent #ClimateAction is included in #coronavirus recovery plans. 

More results from the #UN75 survey ➡️ https://t.co/W9E0NUJtzN https://t.co/etohpcSbhO

As we mark #UN75, @AminaJMohammed & @MelissaFleming discuss with @FemiOke from @AJStream how the UN continues to meet evolving global challenges and how the #GlobalGoals are the solution to many of them. https://t.co/OxKtFnjP34 #SDGLive https://t.co/MzxpWbM4Hy

#COVID19 has exposed major gaps in access to basic infrastructure.

Latest @UNOPS report explains how investing in infrastructure is key to building inclusive societies & achieving lasting peace. https://t.co/fJiCfouwXx #PeaceDay https://t.co/BIMjUGJo9g

On Monday's #WorldAlzheimersDay, learn how to reduce the risk of dementia.

🏃‍♂️🏃‍♀️Exercising regularly
🚭Avoiding smoking & excessive use of alcohol
🍎Eating healthy & controlling your weight
⚖️Maintaining blood pressure, cholesterol & sugar levels

https://t.co/ATviOSM5mG via @WHO https://t.co/4Z0ra0j8Wq

"The ideals of the United Nations – peace, justice, equality and dignity — are beacons to a better world."

-- @antonioguterres celebrates #UN75 at #UNGA https://t.co/Bs0VLy0Al9 https://t.co/w2ZOCQQIbC

Peace is a prerequisite for health, equality and human security.

Women play a key role in sustaining inclusive peace around the world. 

On Monday's #PeaceDay, join @UN_Women in calling for justice and peace for all. https://t.co/wvp48GWuaC https://t.co/lOtgTtn5Gd

During week's historic 75th #UNGA, explore the UN General Assembly Hall in a whole new way! 

Our 360-video experience takes you through memorable moments that have played out on one of the world’s most recognizable political stages. https://t.co/tYMUb1E2tu https://t.co/TDMfVnEz13

"In these days of physical distancing, we may not be able to stand next to one another. But we must still stand together for peace."
-- @antonioguterres 

Monday is International #PeaceDay. https://t.co/xPBFgmoSJz https://t.co/63LOHW1oh0

The UN is on @GIPHY!

Check out our #UNGA & #GlobalGoals gifs and join the conversation on a better future for all!

👉 https://t.co/hCPzixt7mJ https://t.co/4nZRrCs4VL

A peaceful society is one where there is justice and equality for everyone. We can all be part of the solution. 

#StandUp4HumanRights on Monday's #PeaceDay & every day: https://t.co/pxI8P0zVuX https://t.co/NSNFnAfYQu

Let music for peace
Be the paradigm,
For peace means to change
At the right time.

Ahead of next week's #UNGA, W.H. Auden’s “Hymn to the United Nations” expresses the power of hope for a better future. https://t.co/xWc4QNQQ6l https://t.co/hH3oc5Rs89

#COVID19 has reminded us that we are all interconnected and need to work together to overcome global challenges. 

On Monday's #PeaceDay & every day, join us in spreading compassion, kindness & hope in the face of the #coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/5o8H3fWN5z https://t.co/TuIT0Aol6j

Ahead of this historic #UNGA, take the podium and share your vision for the future! 

Our new @Instagram filter allows you to highlight your ideas for a better world & inspire others to act: https://t.co/9JRlM94tQ5 https://t.co/aBkVYIynxR

From #ClimateAction to #COVID19, world leaders will seek solutions to some of the biggest challenges facing humanity during this week's #UNGA.

More details on all the high-level events: https://t.co/xWc4QNQQ6l https://t.co/N8Yeq0UqUM

#UNGA high-level week gets underway Monday. Check out all the ways you can follow the action on @Twitter in these languages!

Arabic: @UNarabic
French: @ONU_fr
Hindi: @UNinHindi
Kiswahili: @UmojaWaMataifa
Portuguese: @NacoesUnidas
Russian: @UnitedNationsRU
Spanish: @ONU_es

#UN75 https://t.co/vNwKSokxUH
The UN family is supporting countries & communities around the world in the fight against the #coronavirus. See some examples in our latest @Twitter moment. https://t.co/0n4J8nBBOF

As the UN marks 75 years of helping people everywhere, this year's #UNGA will be unlike any other.

Here are some ways you can use your voice on social media to show the world you are part of this historic UNGA, no matter where you are in the world. 

https://t.co/8whq18pAwo

Reducing food loss & food waste is key to:

🍅 strengthening food systems
🌾 safeguarding natural resources
⛅️ combating the climate crisis

Learn more from @FAO ahead of the first-ever Food Loss & Waste Day. https://t.co/1wBoORa0XO #FLWDay https://t.co/WPllgeVuYN

.@UNAIDS's @Winnie_Byanyima lost loved ones to AIDS. One of her dearest friends couldn't afford the treatment. 

Hear her talking to @MelissaFleming about fighting health inequalities & the importance of a people's vaccine to stop #COVID19.  https://t.co/H7oI1vYx97 https://t.co/8e8Q4Y58Df

Show your support for the #GlobalGoals with our new fun & interactive @Instagram Stories filter.

See which Goal the wheel lands on and share what actions you’re taking in your everyday life to create a more sustainable future. ➡️ https://t.co/3vQxUy6eJ3 https://t.co/8Q7FujRcDn

Not even the harshest conditions can stop the @WFP team from delivering food assistance in Central African Republic.
See how they're providing life-saving support to millions in the country. https://t.co/4qEv59NzeR #ZeroHunger

 https://t.co/nBGXCT10Qm

The United Nations presents #𝘕𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯𝘴𝘜𝘯𝘪𝘵𝘦𝘥.

This first-of-its-kind film explores the solutions & action needed to tackle the biggest issues facing humanity, from #COVID19 & the climate crisis to poverty & inequality.

Essential viewing! https://t.co/kxVjyXLr0J

Ahead of #UNGA, @antonioguterres discusses global issues and how the commitment of young people to #ClimateAction, justice & equality gives him hope for the future. https://t.co/Q7NPz96nmp https://t.co/1uLgN874kR

Every day, in 13 operations around the world, 95,000 UN peacekeepers serve at great personal risk and under harsh conditions to:
✔️ Maintain and restore peace and security
✔️ Help and protect communities
✔️ Promote human rights
& much more. 

https://t.co/Z1mKcVLuNL #UN75 https://t.co/SsT2QLVXJM

As #COVID19 threatens lives & livelihoods, the #GlobalGoals can lead the way to a sustainable recovery and a better future for all. 

Everyone has a role to play, from taking #ClimateAction to speaking out against injustices & more. https://t.co/8RVOuOTwcq https://t.co/ftZiRZvTnl

On Friday, @antonioguterres, @malala & others came together to help generate a renewed sense of urgency, ambition & accountability for the Decade of Action to achieve the #GlobalGoals and leave no one behind. https://t.co/SnjtwNuQGN https://t.co/iPzkOFglBn

"I believe there is a growing acknowledgment among many key actors that there truly is no military solution and that the only way forward is a negotiation & a political settlement."

-- @UNEnvoySyria tells Security Council. https://t.co/ujYzU7R8wg

"There is power in every decision we make.”

Join @ForestWhitaker & other influential voices, such as @Malala & @antonioguterres, in #NationsUnited, a very special broadcast focusing on solutions for a better world. Premiering here on @Twitter Saturday at 9am ET. https://t.co/VnC86IYMlC

"The UN was not created to take mankind to heaven, but to save humanity from hell." 

-- Former UN Secretary-General Dag Hammarskjöld, who was killed in a plane crash on 18 September 1961. More on his work & legacy: https://t.co/TgSFMZ955E https://t.co/qeOZPwxPii

🎊 Congratulations to the 2020 Class of Young Leaders for the #GlobalGoals.

Meet the 17 change-makers from all over the world, who help lead the way to a more sustainable and inclusive future for all! https://t.co/t7AP1rT1LV https://t.co/5m4iS7THaN

Around the world, women are on the frontlines of the #COVID19 response, yet they are paid about 11% less than their male counterparts. 

On #EqualPayDay & every day, join @UN_Women in demanding equal pay. https://t.co/X4nXPX1Im8 https://t.co/vjFclwQ0MD

Amid #COVID19, the UN is 
😷 delivering 452 million items of protective equipment
📚 assisting 227 million children with distance learning
➕ and much more. 

More on how we are helping countries deal with the impacts of  #coronavirus: https://t.co/VOL88dN09R https://t.co/Z9mvdsQm8X

"Equal pay is essential not only for women, but to build a world of dignity and justice for all."

-- @antonioguterres on Friday's first-ever #EqualPayDay. https://t.co/6j3E79txZZ https://t.co/gFKwiZVQNn

As the UN turns 75, @UN_Disarmament wants to hear the ideas of young people about the importance of disarmament to help prevent armed conflict and promote peace & security. https://t.co/C5M54AENIz #UN75
 https://t.co/l0LTxpjers

On average, women are paid 16% less than men.

For women of colour, immigrant women & women with children, the difference is even greater. 

On Friday's first-ever #EqualPayDay, join @UN_Women in demanding equal pay for all. https://t.co/X4nXPXjjdG https://t.co/KdDPqeFuuT

"We need total commitment."

Ahead of #UNGA, @antonioguterres discusses the urgent need for #ClimateAction & efforts to address the #COVID19 pandemic & other pressing global issues. https://t.co/Q7NPz8OLXP https://t.co/I2mWBVHlVo

Friday is the first-ever International #EqualPayDay.

A woman’s payday shouldn’t be a reminder of an unjust world. More from @UN_Women on closing the gender pay gap. https://t.co/X4nXPX1Im8 https://t.co/sDkYwoG8AJ

📽️ Get a first look at #𝑁𝑎𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛𝑠𝑈𝑛𝑖𝑡𝑒𝑑!

This eye-opening film sets out the action needed for a better world, as #COVID19 threatens decades of progress.
Featuring @antonioguterres, @Malala, @Beyonce, @burnaboy & more.

Join us here on @Twitter this Saturday at 9am ET. https://t.co/ZsICNJNHD9

We need to silence the guns and focus on our common enemy: the #coronavirus.  

Ahead of Monday's #PeaceDay, @antonioguterres stresses the need for a global ceasefire to defeat #COVID19. https://t.co/R96pcUAQm2 https://t.co/mgBFOimlqX

🔴 Climate crisis
🔴 Demographic shifts
🔴 Urbanization
🔴 Emergence of digital technologies 
🔴 Inequalities

These 5 megatrends are all interconnected. 
Our responses should be too, says @UNDESA. https://t.co/SxffZ2ioil https://t.co/sl5iQlps4A

Small acts of kindness go a long way during a global pandemic. 
Find inspiration from humanitarians, teachers & children around the world in our latest @Twitter moment. https://t.co/VKQjJT9wuT

Globally, 4 out of 10 patients are harmed in primary & ambulatory settings.

On Thursday's World Patient Safety Day, see what you can do to help improve safety in health care: https://t.co/SKswXbYMyg via @WHO https://t.co/1s77fTRsoO

Be part of the conversation to find solutions for a better & more sustainable future.

The #SDGActionZone will give you the opportunity to join leading thinkers, creators & activists to accelerate the achievement of the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/K2s0eKtVLU #UNGA https://t.co/8vfSqCsYSZ

Supported & motivated health workers provide safe patient care. 

On Thursday's World Patient Safety Day, @WHO has more on why health worker safety must be prioritized. https://t.co/SKswXbHb9G https://t.co/8H2VhvPd77

From distributing medical supplies to building testing capacity, the UN has led the global health response to #COVID19.

Our new report on the fight against the pandemic and what the world must still do to tackle the crisis.
https://t.co/Ao5viZq9wa

Safe health workers = Safe patients

#COVID19 has drawn attention to the huge challenges & risks health workers face. On Thursday's World Patient Safety Day, speak up for health worker safety. https://t.co/SKswXbYMyg via @WHO https://t.co/OmC69qrkSJ

"We must show unity like never before to overcome today’s emergency, get the world moving and working and prospering again."

-- @antonioguterres ahead of #UNGA. https://t.co/wI1VtoZVSo https://t.co/V1HbKoTjrM

"As we mark the 75th anniversary of the United Nations, it is clear that the world has high expectations of us."

-- @antonioguterres at opening of historic #UNGA session on Tuesday. https://t.co/G0rE1qf0gL https://t.co/HoLoQTS6jy

Watch live as @antonioguterres briefs reporters ahead of the high-level week of the 75th #UNGA session.

https://t.co/RTR9a1KFAj

35 years ago, the world came together & agreed to protect the ozone layer.
The results have been incredibly successful: the ozone hole is expected to gradually close, with ozone returning to pre-1980 values by the 2060s.
https://t.co/HsgS9p4EOQ #OzoneDay https://t.co/QnRRIuCMJg

📚 Self-studies
🏞️ Outdoor classes
📺 Broadcast lessons

#COVID19 may have closed schools, but the pandemic hasn't stopped refugees from continuing their education. https://t.co/pook2xkFdd via @Refugees 

https://t.co/lulhzScyRQ

Traditional storytellers - travelling by horse 🐎 , donkey or camel 🐪 - spread life-saving information about measures to help prevent the spread of #COVID19 in Chad. https://t.co/SYgBpZtZSm https://t.co/sWqjw4MXQz

As we mark the 75th anniversary of the United Nations, we must note again Dag Hammarskjöld’s central role in shaping the UN into a peacemaking & peacekeeping organization.

--@antonioguterres on the 59th anniversary of the former Secretary-General's death. https://t.co/3cHCciUJ3Y https://t.co/5V1vbQPe63

The ongoing healing of the ozone layer is an inspirational example of how the world can come together to address global challenges.

More on Wednesday's #OzoneDay from @UNEP: https://t.co/sD8DMXbnT3 #ClimateAction https://t.co/qPGIUvXEzu

"We need a vaccine for everybody, everywhere - in affordable conditions - because we will only be safe if everybody is safe."

Ahead of #UNGA, @antonioguterres discusses #COVID19, #ClimateAction & other pressing global issues. https://t.co/Q7NPz8OLXP https://t.co/8DQTI53ySs

"The ozone treaties stand out as inspiring examples that show that, where political will prevails, there is little limit to what we can achieve in common cause."

-- @antonioguterres on Wednesday's #OzoneDay. https://t.co/wwhxPmzphZ https://t.co/fdr7LQajbp

The climate crisis makes weather events more intense, more extreme & more destructive.

2020 Atlantic hurricane season is so active, it is expected to exhaust the regular list of storm names, so Greek alphabet will be used for only 2nd time ever. https://t.co/ZjABSllwhu via @WMO https://t.co/yMebntvbdA

Thank you @Twitter for launching the #UNGA emoji, as world leaders prepare for the UN General Assembly! 

Use it to join the conversation as the UN marks 75 years of working for people everywhere. https://t.co/bs5Nspisqi

🌲Land & forests
🌾Agriculture
🍲Food
🐟Fisheries & oceans
🏥Cities & infrastructure
🦀Freshwater
🌊#ClimateAction
🌐Healthy ecosystems & people

@UNBiodiversity outlines areas for change needed to slow nature’s accelerating decline. https://t.co/jsl8E1gqXy #ForNature via @IPBES https://t.co/VT8hMrPYvJ

To achieve the #GlobalGoals, people must be able to contribute to decisions affecting their lives. 

Tuesday is #DemocracyDay. https://t.co/JrHny83wz4 https://t.co/i6oTS3pTcq

It is time for unity. Countries have never had a more compelling reason to work closely together for the common good.

-- @volkan_bozkir calls for solidarity amid #COVID19 & other global challenges. He will be sworn in as 75th #UNGA President on Tuesday.

https://t.co/CzRkD66C3B

"As the world confronts #COVID19, democracy is crucial in ensuring the free flow of information, participation in decision-making & accountability for the response to the pandemic."

-- @antonioguterres on Tuesday's #DemocracyDay. https://t.co/pRSMJ9HHwH https://t.co/lNu9k4odtX

In last 5 years, media freedom has been increasingly threatened, while access to information has become more restricted in all regions of the world. 

@UNESCO has latest #WorldMediaTrends, including more on recent surge in attacks against journalists: https://t.co/Vm2zZzVd27 https://t.co/D0VDpcJJgM

Freedom
Human rights
Free & fair elections

These are essential elements of democracy.  More on Tuesday's #DemocracyDay: https://t.co/036QRZP734 #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/Q2NZJhvIkb

Humanity has faced many crises. I am convinced that together, we can weather the current challenges – and that our societies can emerge better able to prevent injustice.

-- @UNHumanRights chief @mbachelet https://t.co/4GXOrgifY6 https://t.co/9J2uYc72zr

Democracy contributes to peaceful & stable societies and allows people to have a say in decisions affecting their lives.

Tuesday is International #DemocracyDay. https://t.co/036QRZP734 #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/4IKthEOkoz

⚽️ @UNODC and @FIFAcom join forces to fight corruption, foster youth development through soccer, and strengthen community resilience to violence, crime & drugs through sports. https://t.co/1UAm2GAqAl https://t.co/BUvaTRtfrj

#Throwback to the #UNGA Hall just after its completion in 1952. 

As the UN marks its 75th anniversary this year, world leaders will meet virtually as they work to overcome challenges like #COVID19 & the climate crisis. https://t.co/xWc4QO8ruV https://t.co/9i92DhCQmg

September marks the 5th anniversary of the #GlobalGoals - the to-do list for a better & more sustainable future for all.

From taking #ClimateAction to speaking out against injustices, we all have a role to play in transforming our world. https://t.co/8RVOuOBVkS https://t.co/cuhRKfWNeh

Indigenous peoples are at disproportionate risk in public health emergencies such as #COVID19.

Follow @UN4Indigenous for updates on the #coronavirus crisis and its impact on indigenous communities. https://t.co/BbVZ4usYz8 https://t.co/D3Np7sPHzQ

#COVID19 is jeopardizing the conservation of nature around the world.

The Lions Share initiative is helping to protect wildlife & marine ecosystems, while supporting communities dependent on ecotourism. via @UNDP

https://t.co/CKug3auzHV

Misinformation during a crisis like #COVID19 can result in people being left uninformed, unprotected & vulnerable.
❌ Don't share rumours
✔️ Choose content verified by reliable sources

🎨:  Ruth Borrows https://t.co/hbiGNeiD2h

As we work together to develop a #COVID19 vaccine, we must ensure that it is truly a people's vaccine - accessible to everyone, everywhere.

-- @antonioguterres on the need for international solidarity in the development of safe & effective #coronavirus vaccine & treatment. https://t.co/yxTKVEgpHI

Everyone has the right to life, liberty and security of person.

Here’s how @Refugees is working to #StandUp4HumanRights and protect the most vulnerable people during #COVID19. https://t.co/2yeuVhkJXg https://t.co/0YkppIIWMX

From the #COVID19 pandemic to the climate crisis, the UN has been at the forefront of finding solutions to challenges that respect no borders.

At #UN75, let's take #ClimateAction to create a future of prosperity & well-being, while protecting our planet. https://t.co/JErkY8Uhwc https://t.co/2ppER0Bt7c

Improved access to safe water, sanitation & hygiene is vital for protecting human health & can help reduce women's unpaid work.

@UN_Women is drawing attention to these & other challenges women are facing during the #COVID19 pandemic. https://t.co/spTXNvvydg https://t.co/vDeExYqVdQ

😷wear face masks at all times
🙂↔️🙂maintain physical distance
🧴wash your hands frequently

Amid #COVID19, these are some of the requirements for those attending #UNGA in person this year. 

More details: https://t.co/xWc4QO8ruV https://t.co/xHFrrFJOeK

The climate crisis has not stopped amid #COVID19.

With greenhouse gas concentrations in the atmosphere at record levels & continuing to increase, we need #ClimateAction more than ever.

Latest in "United in Science" report. https://t.co/yha9SQDK4F

Quiet corridors but a full programme: the first-ever virtual #UNGA begins on Tuesday, as we mark the 75th anniversary of the UN. 

Here are 5 facts about the historic upcoming session. https://t.co/ZxOLxJUQZV

What we share online can have consequences in the real world. 

Pause - and #TakeCareBeforeYouShare. 

Sign up to help share life-saving information: https://t.co/dviRSvpBON https://t.co/kDUYutN6M2

The number of hungry people globally could reach 840 million by 2030.

@WFP's latest Hunger Map shows the prevalence of undernourishment in each country, providing invaluable information about the single biggest risk to global health. https://t.co/LVTvRtyfV6 https://t.co/Q8UKR2o57q

The Beirut explosion had a devastating impact on health care systems, many of which were already grappling with the #COVID19 pandemic.

See how @UNMigration has stepped up to deliver in-home health support amid the tragedy. https://t.co/LFrr74r7BU https://t.co/v9jOGisSyu

International solidarity & collaboration are key to effectively respond to the global #COVID19 crisis.

More on Saturday's #SouthSouthCooperation Day: https://t.co/eURfNXqjLW

Over 800 @UNVolunteers - more than half of which are women - are on the frontlines of the fight against #COVID19 in 94 countries.

Here's how you can volunteer to make a difference during the pandemic: https://t.co/oOwMYGiTO7 https://t.co/sXwIIKy2D2

Solidarity among countries of the south can accelerate progress towards achieving the #GlobalGoals. 

Saturday is the International Day for #SouthSouthCooperation. https://t.co/eURfNXHUDu https://t.co/NWITnzAlBo

Masks can help keep us safe from #COVID19, along with:

📍 physical distancing
🧴 handwashing
👥👥 avoiding crowds
🤧 covering your mouth & nose when coughing

More from @WHO on how to help prevent the spread of #coronavirus. https://t.co/8SIxDkmIb8

#UNGA like no other...

As the UN marks its 75th anniversary, leaders will meet virtually to tackle some of the most serious threats facing humanity, from #COVID19 to the climate crisis. 

Watch history unfold, starting Tues, 15 Sept. https://t.co/IPRn7lGnot

The poverty rate for women was expected to decrease by 2.7% between 2019 and 2021.

#COVID19 now expected to reverse those gains, with new projections showing a 9.1% increase in women's poverty. 

Latest from @UNDP & @UN_Women.

https://t.co/W0HhrESZmO
